author: CBC News
title: Demonstrations in solidarity with Ukraine held across Canada on Sunday | CBC News
description: Canadians continue to show support for Ukraine and its fierce and urgent battle against a Russian invasion that has tossed life there into sudden chaos.
content:
Demonstrations were held in more Canadian cities to show of solidarity with Ukraine on Sunday, which marked the fourth day of Russia's wide-ranging invasion.
